category: news
title: "Techfest 2022 showcases artificial intelligence and machine learning through racing"
excerpt: "The Pacific Northwest National Laboratory tested its artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) skills through Deep Racer, where staff gathered to race small cars. They raced 1/18th scale cars using only AI and ML at the PNNL racetrack during the sixth annual Techfest."
